name: koinos-miner
description: Mining application used to mint the KOIN ERC-20.

scripts.postinstall: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=.. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release .. && cmake --build . --target install --config Release && cd .. && rm -rf build
scripts.postinstall:osx: rm -rf build && mkdir build && cd build && cmake -DOPENSSL_ROOT_DIR=/usr/local/Cellar/openssl@1.1/1.1.1h -DOPENSSL_LIBRARIES=/usr/local/Cellar/openssl@1.1/1.1.1h/lib -DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=.. -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release .. && cmake --build . --target install --config Release && cd .. && rm -rf build

author: OpenOrchard, Inc.
